p: In the 45 cases with codetected respiratory pathogens, the total number of detected pathogens was 98; RSV and B. pertussis had the highest rate of 17.3%, followed by Flu A (16.3%), Rhino/Entero (15.3%), and PIV (15.3%). The rates of detection of AdV, hMPV, Cov, and M. pneumoniae were less than 10.0% (8.2%, 4.1%, 5.1%, and 1.0%, respectively). C. pneumoniae was not detected in any patients.
